==Descriptions==
{{Description/Viewpoint|The Mausoleum of King Deshret}}
{{Description/Viewpoint|Aaru's Shut}}
{{Description|King Deshret left a golden husk here, and his intelligence lies elsewhere. The giant pyramid is in fact only one corner of the palace, and many, many more temples may be found beneath it.|[[Scarlet Sand Slate#Delving Deeper|Scarlet Sand Slate: Delving Deeper]]}}

==Trivia==
* Entering the Mausoleum after the completing [[Soheil's Wish]] will trigger the following lines:
{{Dialogue Start}}
:;(Approach the hole in the floor in front of room with the sarcophagus)
::'''Paimon:''' Hmm, did Paimon recall wrongly? This path wasn't here when we came before...
::'''Paimon:''' Let's go find out!
{{Dialogue End}}
